name: Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D
summary: Ready to attack with pounce as a wild wolf in this wolf simulator. Go around big fantasy jungle and attack viciously by using your sharp claws and sensitive ears to navigate the prey in this low poly game with your ultimate wolf. Leading a family pack of cubs and a mate, your job is to protect and feed them. Start battle in high resolution forest as an arctic wolf also with wild wolf sim. Play this wild life game with multiple wolf quests in best 3D wolf game. Wolf simulator games to raise a family were never been so thrilling. Most wanted fantasy story of ultimate wolf is here. Play as realistic wild wolf and survive in the wilderness of forest with our Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D.
